locale.message: Notify co-authors when submission process is completed. This plugin uses a prepared email with the key 'SUBMISSION_ACK_COAUTHORS'. You need to create it so the plugin can use it to send the extra email. You can use the following variables inside the template: {$authorName}, {$authorUsername}, {$editorialContactSignature}, {$articleTitle}, {$articleAbstract}
